events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position at our company.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the engineering team focusing on software development.
Recruiter John has been assigned to follow up with the software engineer applicant and coordinate further steps.
An initial screening was conducted to evaluate the candidate's experience in software engineering and development.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about the software engineer role and company culture.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering panel for the candidate next week.
The candidate completed the technical interview showcasing strong skills in software development and problem solving.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's career goals, compensation expectations and company fit.
The HR interview went well with positive feedback regarding the candidate's alignment with corporate values.
An offer for the software engineer position has been proposed to the candidate including salary and benefits details.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and asked a few clarifying questions about the onboarding process.
The candidate has accepted the offer and is excited to join the engineering team as a software developer.
The onboarding process has started with orientation and initial setup for the new software engineer hire.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with the new software engineer fully onboarded and integrated.
